name: updateNetworkWirelessBluetoothSettings
description: Update the Bluetooth settings for a network. See the docs page for Bluetooth settings.

major.description: The major number to be used in the beacon identifier. Only valid in 'Non-unique' mode.

majorMinorAssignmentMode.description: The way major and minor number should be assigned to nodes in the network. ('Unique', 'Non-unique')

minor.description: The minor number to be used in the beacon identifier. Only valid in 'Non-unique' mode.

scanningEnabled.description: Whether APs will scan for Bluetooth enabled clients.

uuid.description: The UUID to be used in the beacon identifier.

$ul: **eslEnabled**: Whether ESL is enabled on this network.
**major**: The major number to be used in the beacon identifier. Only valid in 'Non-unique' mode.
**majorMinorAssignmentMode**: The way major and minor number should be assigned to nodes in the network. ('Unique', 'Non-unique')
**minor**: The minor number to be used in the beacon identifier. Only valid in 'Non-unique' mode.
**scanningEnabled**: Whether APs will scan for Bluetooth enabled clients.
**uuid**: The UUID to be used in the beacon identifier.
